
# My University
```{r}
univLatLong <- data.frame(lat = 43.7729946, lng = -79.4991)

univLatLong %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(popup = "York Universty")
```

# My house
```{r}
houseLatLong <- data.frame(lat = 43.7645, lng = -79.4140)

houseLatLong %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(popup = "Canada home")

```

# Both locations
```{r}
my_address <- data.frame(
  lat = c(43.7729946, 43.7645),
  lng = c(-79.4991, -79.4140)
)

my_map <- my_address %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(popup = c("York Universty", "Canada home"))

my_map
```
# The boundary
```{r}
my_map %>% 
 addRectangles(lat1 = 43.7729946, lng1 = -79.4991,
                lat2 = 43.7645, lng2 = -79.4140)
```
